message: GitHub repository must contain ONLY public-facing, standardized documentation. NEVER commit internal tracking documents (development plans, progress tracking, session summaries). Keep these local in .failsafe/local-docs/ or similar. Example violations: LMAPP_DEVELOPMENT_PLAN.md, V0.2.2_PROGRESS*.md, SESSION_SUMMARY*.md, V0.2.2_COMPLETE.md
action: Review all commits; remove internal docs; add rule to pre-commit hooks
